summary: This module provides a set of utility classes for querying and manipulating component data within the MAPDL environment. It includes classes for retrieving component properties such as center coordinates, wave numbers, and normal vectors, as well as classes for handling displacement components and inverse queries.
business_intent: The module aims to simplify the process of accessing and working with component-related data in MAPDL, making it easier for developers to retrieve component attributes, perform displacement calculations, and execute inverse queries for component data.
